conversion_verification.notes: All mandatory 3D conversion criteria are met, allowing further scoring.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent transformation. Walls have proper height and thickness, floors are distinct, and interior volume is well-represented. The viewing angle is appropriate.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Most room configurations and wall geometries align well. Slight discrepancies in the utility/toilet area layout in the 3D model compared to the 2D plan, where the utility room feels narrower and the door placement for the toilet is different. The balcony enclosure is also slightly different.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present and correctly placed with reasonable scale and orientation. Minor styling differences are acceptable.

visual_clarity.notes: The rendering is clean, with clear geometry and distinguishing features. Lighting is good, and there are no significant artifacts or clutter. Missing text labels is a plus.

detected_errors.description: The layout of the utility area and toilet appears to have some geometric distortion/rearrangement compared to the 2D plan. The utility area entrance from the kitchen seems slightly different in configuration. The balcony enclosure is also simplified/different.

summary: The 3D conversion successfully transforms the 2D floor plan into a geometrically faithful isometric cutaway, with only minor discrepancies in the utility and toilet area layout.
